system.description: Your mind has been infused with vast stores of knowledge, granting you access to information across many fields of study.
system.benefit: Character counts as having all Common Lore and Scholastic Lore Skills at Rank 1 (Basic/Known), they also add One Degree of Success to any successful Common or Scholastic Lore Tests. If later purchasing Lore Skill advances, they must still start at rank 1.

specialAbilities.name: Universal Lore Access
specialAbilities.description: You count as having all Common Lore and Scholastic Lore skills at Rank 1 (Known/Trained). You add +1 Degree of Success to any successful Common Lore or Scholastic Lore test. If later purchasing Lore skill advances, you must still start at rank 1.
